title: SOLD: T205 multistrike Broad Leaf Al Bridwell...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: T205 multistrike Broad Leaf Al Bridwell...
posts.post_content:
Definitely not one of your run of the mill T205 oddities.  For sale is a T205 Broad Leaf Al Bridwell.  The reverse has been struck 4 times to produce this boldly printed anomaly.  Combined with the rarity of Broad Leaf backs, it makes for quite the card.

The price is SOLD, net to me, postpaid in the continental U.S.

Please contact me at [url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.  Thank you.

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
